mapper.select: select work_order_num, name, worker_num, work_order_type, expiration_time, work_order_name, file, work_order_state, price, reason, offline_reason, dep_num, phone, password, state, in_service, dep_name, dep_level, dep_budget from adminSearchOrder_DetailPerson where work_order_num = #{workOrderNum}
mapper.insert: insert into adminSearchOrder_DetailPerson(work_order_num, name, worker_num, work_order_type, expiration_time, work_order_name, file, work_order_state, price, reason, offline_reason, dep_num, phone, password, state, in_service, dep_name, dep_level, dep_budget) values (#{workOrderNum}, #{name}, #{workerNum}, #{workOrderType}, #{expirationTime}, #{workOrderName}, #{file}, #{workOrderState}, #{price}, #{reason}, #{offlineReason}, #{depNum}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{state}, #{inService}, #{depName}, #{depLevel}, #{depBudget})

insert into adminSearchOrder_DetailPerson(work_order_num, name, worker_num, work_order_type, expiration_time, work_order_name, file, work_order_state, price, reason, offline_reason, dep_num, phone, password, state, in_service, dep_name, dep_level, dep_budget) values
(#{entity.workOrderNum}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.workerNum}, #{entity.workOrderType}, #{entity.expirationTime}, #{entity.workOrderName}, #{entity.file}, #{entity.workOrderState}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.reason}, #{entity.offlineReason}, #{entity.depNum}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.inService}, #{entity.depName}, #{entity.depLevel}, #{entity.depBudget})
